arStrings.szText: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} or {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Shadow Imbued{/c} Skill has up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to release an explosion that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage to the target and surrounding enemies, {c_important}{u}Chilling{/u}{/c} them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
